body:
New package: hdf-eos5: Hierarchical Data Format for Earth Observing System based on hdf5

The URL structure for downloads uses the checksum of file as part of the path, and also the name format changed between last two versions (not sure if that is an one-time thing or if we should expect changes with every version change).  To compensate, creating a list with version and checksum, etc. which is used both for generating version specific URLs but also for the version()
method.
title: hdf-eos5: new package (HDF for Earth Observing Sytem using hdf v5)
